infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Insight to capture images for event logs.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Insight to record audio notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Insight to attach photos to logs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Insight to attach your location to events.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Insight to read and write your calendar events.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Allow Insight to read and write your calendar events.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Allow Insight to read your health data.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Allow Insight to write health data you create.
